title: In our Words: Stories from Victorian Veterans, Part Two
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
abstract: Nine stories from Victorian war veterans.
description: Nine Victorian war veterans tell of their experiences through the creation of digital stories, as part of ACMI's Digital Storytelling workshop. While the horror and dangers and residual trauma of war are evident, these stories also pay tribute to the qualities of mateship and bravery instilled in them by the experience.
